Parameters: BluetoothDevice: The remote device that has requested the write operation
int: The Id of the request
BluetoothGattDescriptor: Descriptor to be written to.
boolean: true, if this write operation should be queued for later execution.
boolean: true, if the remote device requires a response
int: The offset given for the value
byte: The value the client wants to assign to the descriptor
onDescriptorWriteRequest(android.bluetoo.Description: A remote client has requested to write to a local descriptor. An application must call @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGattServer#sendResponse_E@ to complete the request.

Parameters: int: Returns @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#GATT_SUCCESS_E@ if the service was added successfully.
BluetoothGattService: The service that has been added

boolean: Whether the pending writes should be executed (true) or cancelled (false)

Parameters: BluetoothDevice: The remote device the notification has been sent to

Parameters: int: the transmitter PHY in use. One of @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_1M_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_2M_E@, and @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_CODED_E@
int: the receiver PHY in use. One of @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_1M_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_2M_E@, and @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_CODED_E@
